citation: State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2004 (Tas)
text:
State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2004

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 12 of the State Service Act 2000 .

2 February 2004

Richard Butler

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. Bacon

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2004 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 2 February 2004.

3.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the State Service Act 2000 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 February 2004

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
